0.title: Log records received

1.title: Metric records received

2.title: Log records refused

3.title: Metric records refused

5.title: Trace spans received

6.title: Trace spans refused

8.title: Log records accepted by processor

9.title: Metric points accepted by processor

10.title: Spans accepted by processor

11.title: Log records dropped by processor

12.title: Metric points dropped by processor

13.title: Spans dropped by processor

14.title: Processor Batch size

15.title: Processor Batch timeout trigger

17.title: Log records sent by exporter

18.title: Metric point sent by exporter

19.title: Spans  sent by exporter

21.title: Queue Percentage per Exporter
21.query:
timeseries total=avg(otelcol_exporter_queue_size),capacity=avg(otelcol_exporter_queue_capacity), by:{service_name}
| fieldsAdd ratio=(total[]/capacity[])*100
| fieldsAdd ratiopermin=ratio[]/todouble(interval/1m)
| fieldsRemove total,capacity,ratio

23.title: CPU per min

25.title: Total allocated bytes

26.title: System memory

27.title: memory allocated to process

29.title: Cpu usage in millicores
29.query:
timeseries cpu = avg(k8s.pod.cpu.utilization), by:{k8s.namespace.name, k8s.pod.name}
| filter k8s.namespace.name == "dynatrace"

31.title: Log records ration (out/in)
31.query:
timeseries total=sum(otelcol_receiver_accepted_log_records), sent=sum(otelcol_exporter_sent_log_records)
| fieldsAdd ration=sent[]/total[]
| fieldsAdd rationpers=ration[]/todouble(interval/1m) * 100
| fieldsRemove total,sent, ration

32.title: Metric point ration (out/in)
32.query:
timeseries total=sum(otelcol_receiver_accepted_metric_points), sent=sum(otelcol_exporter_sent_metric_points)
| fieldsAdd ration=sent[]/total[]
| fieldsAdd rationpers=ration[]/todouble(interval/1m) * 100
| fieldsRemove total,sent, ration

33.title: Trace records ration (out/in)
33.query:
timeseries total=sum(otelcol_receiver_accepted_spans), sent=sum(otelcol_exporter_sent_spans)
| fieldsAdd ration=sent[]/total[]
| fieldsAdd rationpers=ration[]/todouble(interval/1m) * 100
| fieldsRemove total,sent, ration

37.title: Type of collector deployment
37.query:
timeseries avg(otelcol_process_uptime), by: {service_name, service_instance_id}
| summarize Collectors = count(), by: {service_name}

38.title: Number  of collectors
38.query:
timeseries avg(otelcol_process_uptime), by: {service_instance_id}
| summarize Collectors = count()

41.title: Number of metric points ingested
41.query:
timeseries sum(dt.sfm.server.metrics.ingest.external_datapoints), by: { source, dt.ingest.channel }
| filter source == "opentelemetry"

50.query:
fetch logs 
| filter k8s.container.name == "otc-container"
| filter contains(content, "Partial success response")
| parse content, " BOS LD  SPACE+ LD 'Partial success response' LD 'data_type\":'  SPACE+ DQS:signal ',' LD 'message\":' SPACE+ DQS:error_message LD 'dropped' WORD '\":' SPACE+ INT:nbdropped  LD "
| filter nbdropped>0
| parse error_message, " LD ':'( SPACE+ LD:type ':' SPACE+ LD ':' SPACE+ SQS:name SPACE '-' SPACE 'Reason:' SPACE+ WORD:code )  "
| summarize count = count(), by:{name, type, code}
| sort count desc
| fields name, type, count, code

52.title: Number records dropped by OTLP ingest API
52.query:
fetch logs 
| filter k8s.container.name == "otc-container"
| filter contains(content, "Partial success response")
| parse content, " BOS LD  SPACE+ LD 'Partial success response' LD 'data_type\":'  SPACE+ DQS:signal ',' LD 'message\":' SPACE+ DQS:error_message LD 'dropped' WORD '\":' SPACE+ INT:nbdropped  LD "
| summarize records_dropped=sum(nbdropped), by:{bin(timestamp, 30s),signal}
